thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 15
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 15 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to July 15
text:
July 2 For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** THURSDAY, JULY 2 SEOUL - South Korean Finance Minister Choi Kyung-hwan will chair a regular meeting on economic events - 2300 GMT. ** SINGAPORE - Top Singaporean politicians speak at SG50+ Conference (to July 3). Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong, head of Monetary Authority of Singapore Ravi Menon, Finance Minister Tharman Shanmugaratnam, former Prime Minister Goh Chok Tong will speak at the conference. FRIDAY, JULY 3 MOSCOW - BRICS Sherpas and Sous-Sherpas meetings (to July 6). PRAGUE - Czech National Bank to publish minutes of June board meeting - 0700 GMT. BEIJING - U.S. Secretary of the Interior Sally Jewell will brief media before speaking with Chinese Vice Premier Wang Yang about U.S.-China cooperation on fighting wildlife trafficking - 0600 GMT.
MONDAY, JULY 6
MEXICO CITY - Mexico Finance Minister Luis Videgaray and OECD Secretary-General Angel Gurria will co-host a "Global Dialogue on the Future of Productivity: Towards an OECD Productivity Network" (to July 7). TUESDAY, JULY 7 BUDAPEST - Hungarian central bank's non-rate-setting meeting. ABUJA - Central Bank of Kenya holds interest rate decision meeting. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (to July 8). RABAT - Central bank of Morocco holds monetary and financial committee meeting. WEDNESDAY, JULY 8 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland announces rate decision, followed by Central Bank Governor Marek Belka's news conference - 1400 GMT. BUDAPEST - Central Bank of Hungary will publish the minutes of June policy meeting - 1200 GMT. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia holds executive board meeting - 2200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatian National Bank holds council meeting. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia holds monetary policy committee meeting (to July 09).
THURSDAY, JULY 9
KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia announces interest rate decision, followed by policy statement - 1000 GMT. SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds monetary policy committee meeting 0100 GMT.
TUESDAY, JULY 14
JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting.
WEDNESDAY, JULY 15
ACCRA - Bank of Ghana's announces interest rate decision - 1130 GMT.
